IMAGE As requested your News Alert for YHOO follows from Eq uityAlertcom University of Dayton Selects Sybaris Antigen for Its Un matchable Protection of Domino Servers Against Email Borne Viruses and Mal icious CodeDOne of Yahoos Highest Ranking Most Wired Universities and Ohios Largest Private University Deploys Antigen for Proactive Email Secu rity E NORTHPORT NY Nov BUSINESS WIRE Sybari Software Inc the premier developers of Antigen a comprehensive antivirus conten tmanagement and email security solution for Microsoft Exchange and Lotus Domino environments today announced that the University of Dayton UD w hich was recently ranked No of colleges and universities who were ac credited with the title of being one of Yahoos Most Wired has selected An tigen for antivirus and security protection of their Lotus NotesDomino ser vers that support more than students and nearly faculty member s and administrative and research personnel NIMDA SIRCAM LOVE a nd MELISSA have clearly demonstrated how crippling a virus can be in term s of lost time data and productivity The University of Dayton could not afford to join the growing number of universities and large organizations t hat have experienced the staggering costs of data recovery and downtime ass ociated with these and other malicious viruses After conducting a full eva luation of server products from such companies as Trend Micro and McAfee U D concluded that a serverlevel solution offering multiple scan engines and superior file filtering capabilities coupled with a strong vendor commitm ent to delivering a proactive line of defense from Internet and emailborn e viruses would provide the level of protection UD needs today and in the future We selected Sybaris Antigen for many reasons including trusted scanning which means less processor time the ability to quickly block any files or file type multiple scan engines and the x uptime said Su san McCabe Director Lotus Integration for the University of Dayton We d ont need to take our servers down to apply updates Antigen truly gives us all of the features we feel are important and delivers the best value Sybaris Antigen is the only solution with a choice of up to five leading s can engine technologies from Network Associates Norman Data Defense Soph os and two Computer Associates engines from their Etrust offering Since n ew viruses may survive one engine Antigen institutes an extra measure of p rotection by enabling users to run multiplescan engines virtually elimina ting network infection Antigen comes equipped with Content Management faci lities that provide the proactive support needed to maintain a virus free g roupware environment With the Antigen File Filter AFF administrators ca n filter email attachments by file name type or wild card A preemptive content management feature like this can prove extremely useful while wait ing for signature files from antivirus vendors with proprietary engines an d virus labs We pioneered this industry with our flagship release of An tigen for Lotus NotesDomino environments in the nineties said Rocco Donn ino vice president of sales the Americas for Sybari Software Our lates t release of Antigen further validates our commitment to developing highly specialized solutions for messaging platforms and its selection by such a p restigious university confirms our success in turning out winning solutions ABOUT SYBARI Since Sybari has the led the market in providing i nnovative solutions to groupwarebased virus and security threats Today o ver million Microsoft ExchangeOutlook and Lotus DominoNotes seats are v irusfree as a direct result of Sybaris Antigen technology Sybaris Antig en is unsurpassed in providing protection of corporate messaging environmen ts Antigens unique architecture institutes a preemptive line of defense f rom viruses and malicious code Antigen for Microsoft Exchange and Antigen for Lotus Domino are distributed in more than countries through Sybaris worldwide locations and distribution network Sybari is headquartered in E ast Northport New York with an EMEA headquarters in Madrid Spain and an A sia Pacific Headquarters in Singapore Sybaris clients include IBM Amazon com Cable Wireless Compaq Con Edison Dell Deloitte Touche Eastma n Chemical Getronics JD Power Lufthansa Mayo Foundation Merrill Lynch Nortel Pirelli Reckitt Benckiser Sony Target Texaco Tosco Union Pac ific US Federal Government and Visa Sybaris many strategic partners inc lude Lotus Development NYSEIBM Microsoft NASDAQMSFT Computer Associ ates NYSECA Compaq NYSECPQ and Sun Microsystems NASDAQSUNW Ab out The University of Dayton The University of Dayton UD is one of the n ations largest Catholic universities and Ohios largest private university with an enrollment of more than students including more than fulltime undergraduates Founded in by the Society of Mary Mariani sts a Roman Catholic teaching order of priests and brothers The Universi ty of Dayton is a residential learning community with more than academic programs in arts and sciences business administration education and alli ed professions engineering and law The University of Dayton was recently named a national doctoral university and ranks among the top Catholic unive rsities and colleges in the country according to the new issue of America s Best Colleges from US News and World Report UD was previously included in the top list of the best regional colleges in the Midwest but its wi de range of doctoral programs and other features now qualify it as a nation al university under new classification guidelines by the Carnegie Foundatio n for Advancement in Teaching Other products and company names mentioned herein may be trademarks of their Internet Property SUNNYVALE Calif Nov BUSINESS WIR E Yahoo Inc NasdaqYHOO a leading global Internet communications commerce and media company today announced that it has again earned the to p ranking as the worlds most trafficked Internet destination according to the NielsenNetRatings October Global Internet Index released yesterday Based on the Index Yahoo is the leader in unique audience reach and tot al time spenta for home users for the th consecutive month The Niels enNetRatings Global Internet Index provides the only worldwide measuremen t of Web audience and usage patterns across countries and covers perc ent of the global Internet audience universe Highlights from NielsenNe tRatings Global Internet Index for October include Yahoos un ique audience increased more than five percent for October growing faster than the active Internet universe which rose percent f or Octoberb According to NielsenNetratings Yahoo extended it s reach to percent of the worlds total Internet population duri ng October which is almost five percent greater than its nearest competitor MSN Consumers currently spend more time on Yaho o than any other Web portal Yahoo consumers spent approximately hour and minutes on Yahoo during October Users consum ed nearly three times more page views on Yahoo than AOL and pe rcent more than MSN Scope of NielsenNetRatings Global Internet Index The NielsenNetRatings Internet audience measurement service collects re altime data from more than individuals with access to the Internet in countries For more information on the NielsenNetRatings Global In ternet Index please visit wwwnielsennetratingscom a Total time sp ent is the average time spent per person multiplied by the number of unique users b NielsenNetRatings estimates the at home active Internet uni verse to be million users About Yahoo Yahoo Inc is a leading glo bal Internet communications commerce and media company that offers a compr ehensive branded network of services to
